tags.name: chartist-render
tags.description:
`chartist-render`

Events:

  * `chartist-render-draw` - Fired when chart is being drawn.

  * `chartist-render-created` - Fired once chart is created and accessibility features are added.

Properties:

  * `id` {`string`} - 

  * `type` {`string`} - 

  * `scale` {`string`} - 

  * `chartTitle` - 

  * `chartDesc` - 

  * `data` - 

  * `options` - 

  * `responsiveOptions` {`never[]`} - 

  * `showTable` {`boolean`} - 

  * `__chartId` -

attributes.name: onchartist-render-draw
attributes.description: `chartist-render-draw` - Fired when chart is being drawn.

attributes.name: onchartist-render-created
attributes.description: `chartist-render-created` - Fired once chart is created and accessibility features are added.

tags.name: chartist-render

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
`id` {`string`} - The unique identifier of the chart.

Property: id

Default: chart

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
`type` {`string`} - The type of chart:bar, line, or pie

Property: type

Default: bar

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description:
`scale` {`string`} - The scale of the chart. (See https://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/api-documentation.html)```
Container class	Ratio
.ct-square          1
.ct-minor-second	  15:16
.ct-major-second	  8:9
.ct-minor-third	    5:6
.ct-major-third	    4:5
.ct-perfect-fourth	3:4
.ct-perfect-fifth	  2:3
.ct-minor-sixth	    5:8
.ct-golden-section	1:1.618
.ct-major-sixth	    3:5
.ct-minor-seventh	  9:16
.ct-major-seventh	  8:15
.ct-octave	        1:2
.ct-major-tenth	    2:5
.ct-major-eleventh	3:8
.ct-major-twelfth	  1:3
.ct-double-octave	  1:4```

Property: scale

Default: ct-minor-seventh

attributes.name: chart-title
attributes.description:
`chart-title` {`string`} - The chart title used for accessibility.

Property: chartTitle

Default: null

attributes.name: chart-desc
attributes.description:
`chart-desc` {`string`} - The chart description used for accessibility.

Property: chartDesc

Default: null

attributes.name: data
attributes.description:
`data` - The chart data.

Property: data

Default: null

attributes.name: options
attributes.description:
`options` - The options available at  https://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/api-documentation.html.

Property: options

Default: null

attributes.name: responsive-options
show-table
attributes.description:
`show-table` {`boolean`} - The show data in table form as well? Default is false.

Property: showTable

Default: false

attributes.name: onchartist-render-draw
attributes.description: `chartist-render-draw` - Fired when chart is being drawn.

attributes.name: onchartist-render-created
attributes.description: `chartist-render-created` - Fired once chart is created and accessibility features are added.
